name: LIFEPOWR
description:
Since 2015, LIFEPOWR has been developing solutions for energy problems. We turn ideas into real impact in the market.

Our advanced control algorithms for decentralized energy storage and charging points provide significant added value for households, businesses, and society. We do this by connecting many small capacities to form a virtual network and centrally managing them as a whole. This enables us to bring new energy services to the market in collaboration with our partners and to simplify the complexity of the energy technology transition.
